attributes.action: Accept Indian Vaccine Certification for Visitors from India.
attributes.additional_details: If the Indian vaccines are approved and recognised by WHO and world agencies there shouldn't be any reason to not accept the Vaccination Certification from Government of India.
attributes.background: Accept Indian Vaccine Certification for Visitors from India, end the pain of 10 days quarantine. Also negotiate with the Indian government to reciprocate.

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign this petition calling for a similar action: 

Add India to the list of UK approved vaccination programmes for travel:
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/597491
